import React from 'react'; import {useIdea} from '../../context/idea.context' import { Card, Button } from 'react-bootstrap'; const Idea = ({ datos }) => { const {votos, upVote,downVote} = useIdea(); return ( <> {datos.idea} {datos.description}
Author: {datos.author.name}

Puntos: {votos }

 ) } export default Idea
